dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5963 IH: District of Columbia Juror Pay Parity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To amend title 11, District of Columbia Official Code, to provide that grand and petit jurors serving in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia shall receive fees and expenses at the same rates paid to grand and petit jurors appearing in the district courts of the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the District of Columbia Juror Pay Parity Act.

section.header: Establishing fees for jurors serving in Superior Court of the District of Columbia at same rates paid for jurors serving in United States district courts

subsection.text: Section 11–1912(a), District of Columbia Official Code, is amended to read as follows:

Grand and petit jurors serving in the Superior Court shall receive fees and expenses at rates equivalent to the rates provided under section 1871 of title 28, United States Code, for fees and allowances paid to grand and petit jurors appearing in the district courts of the United States.
Section 15–718, District of Columbia Official Code, is repealed.
The amendments made by this Act shall apply with respect to fees and expenses paid on or after the first day of the first fiscal year which begins after the date of the enactment of this Act.
